subject: Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: BMW Oracle Racing, the American syndicate set to challenge Alinghi in the 2009 America’s Cup, will be co-skippered by the three-time Cup winner Russell Coutts. Coutts will share skipper duties with the Australian James Spithill, who guided Luna Rossa to the most recent Louis Vuitton Cup final.
